overview:
Home of the free online Bible: enjoy daily sayings from Jesus and His Word, compare versions, search topics and energize your blog with Just ONE Word!

For millions of people, the Bible is their secret to connecting with God. If youâ€™ve never experienced this, then at Just1Word youâ€™ll have the chance. Here you can:

* Search the Bible (entries are tagged so that you can find results fast)
* Set-up an online Bible (for free)

To get started, try the scrambled word games or click on Today’s Passages.
